Action.author: wjzheng
Action.body: Before we complete the move to new TOC, we can do some re-organization on existing topics to have a better structure.

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: We have made a rather comprehensive reorg of the TOC to radically simplify the presentation. https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-8666 ~odowdaibm ~pandrejko suggest maybe this could be closed?

Action.author: pandrejko
Action.body: ~odowdaibm - do you have an opinion here based on the work delivered in FAB-8666?

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: ~odowdaibm I think that this can be closed. I believe we have accomplished our objective with FAB-8666. We can reopen if you disagree.
